title: Calculation  (Python) Developer
job_desc:
Calculation Developer

  • Analyze client requirements and provide inputs in planning appropriate technical solution with focus on accuracy, build efficiency and maintainability of calculation implementation and letter configuration.

  • Deliver technical solutions for calculation automation implementation and letter configuration for new client enhancement support to existing clients under the supervision of senior members.

  • Resolve routine issues, escalating more complex problems to senior team members as appropriate.

  • Collaborate with several teams and developers, communication is required to support what is required in implementation with the supervision from senior team member.

  • In depth knowledge in different aspect for pension calculation development and letters configuration

  • Remain up to date with business and legislative requirements and interprets the practical impact to calculation development and letters configuration.

  • Develop relationship with other business areas to gain a strong understanding of products and services as well as key business process.

  • Share best practices of coding and development with the team to encourage continuous improvement and innovation.

  • Work in the line with ISO standards, TAS system, process quality requirements and compliance

title: Python Developer (WFH, Day Shift)
job_desc:
Platinum Outsourcing is an award winning, Australian owned and managed co sourcing BPO – operating out of both the Philippines and Indonesia. We are a fast growing scale-up, opening our first offices in the Philippines only 3 years ago (and growing to 155+ employees in that time).

We have plans to expand to 200+ employees within the next 3 to 6 months.

Our client is an Australian based, SaaS company, with team members in Australia, Vietnam, Philippines and India.

We are seeking an mid level Python Developer , with experience within NoSQL databases.

About you:

  • 3+ years of experience as a Python Developer with a strong portfolio of projects.
  • Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering or a related field
  • Experience with advanced Python programming concepts is essential.
  • Experience writing idiomatic Python code
  • In-depth understanding of the Python software development stacks, ecosystems, frameworks and tools.
  • Experience with Python data processing frameworks such as Pandas
  • Strong knowledge of database technologies, both SQL and NoSQL
  • Experience with writing complex SQL queries and performance tuning
  • Experience with Python project deployments and CI pipelines
  • Excellent problem-solving ability with solid communication and collaboration skills.

What we offer:

 

  • Day shift, no weekends
  • Permanent WFH, or the option for hybrid or WFO
  • Above market remuneration
  • HMO Day 1 - Primary and Dependent 
  • Performance incentives
  • Team building events and activities
  • Brand new IT equipment
  • 15 days VL
  • 5 days sick leave
  • 13 month and all other government mandated benefits

title: Python Developer for LLM Data Annotation/Generation
job_desc:
Position Summary


Role: Software Developer - Data Annotation / Generation Engineer


Nature of Project: LLM for Code Generation (Coding Projects Focus)


We are looking for experienced software developers to join our team and contribute to the advancement of artificial intelligence through the generation and curation of datasets to be used for coding generation. Successful candidates will be involved in creating, preparing, and assessing code-related datasets that our clients will use for their AI model training, ensuring that future AI coding assistants are accurate, efficient, and proficient in generating high-quality software development code.


Key Responsibilities:

  • Tasks may vary between projects. Example tasks may include:
  • Generation of coding-related dialogue between humans and AI assistants
  • Test case creation for human and AI-generated code
  • Completion and repair of broken code
  • Evaluation of an AI model’s proposed solution for coding tasks based on a coding instruction prompt
  • Assessment of coding instruction prompts to ensure clarity and feasibility
  • Review and validation of the modifications made to a source code by an AI model to a coding instruction prompt
  • Detailed feedback on the and the corresponding response across multiple parameters, as defined by the client


Qualifications:


  • Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science or equivalent work experience in software development
  • 2 to 4 years of actual development experience in at least one of the following programming languages- Python, Java, JavaScript- with a strong understanding of data structures and language fundamentals
  • Technical lead experience in handling development teams
  • Performs code and design review ensuring best practices are observed by the development team
  • Experience with test-driven development
  • Experience with code optimization
  • Excellent command of the English language, with strong reading comprehension, and writing skills
  • Strong problem-solving and troubleshooting abilities
  • Ability to work in a fast-paced environment and meet tight deadlines
  • Outcome-driven focus with excellent time management and decision-making skills


Preferred Qualifications:

  • Experience in command-line development and deployment.
  • Experience in both front-end and back-end development is a plus
  • Experience with cloud services and modern development platforms
  • Experience in data annotation and labeling


Looking for candidates with experience in any of the following areas:


Python

  • Web development and deployment - Django, Flask
  • Data processing libraries - Pyspark, NumPy, SciPy, Pandas, Matplotlib
  • AI/ML libraries - TensorFlow, Scikit-Learn, Keras, OpenCV


JavaScript

  • TypeScript
  • Angular
  • ReactJS


Java

  • Spring Boot
  • Java 8 to Java 11 SE;
  • build and deployment to application servers
  • JUnit and Mock Testing

title: Programmer (Software Developer Associate)
job_desc:
JOB SUMMARY

The Software Developer Associate is responsible for the development, installation, maintenance, and modification of application programs that supports the company’s business requirements. This position is also responsible for gathering user requirements and project documentation in coordination with the users/requesting department.

 

RESPONSIBILITIES

  1. Software Development

    • Identify and analyze user requirements and create detailed program specifications that meet both functional and technical requirements.

    • Break down program specification into its simplest element and translate into programming language. 

    • Write high quality source code using VB, .NET, ASP.NET, C#, SQL, JavaScript, HTML, XML and PHP to create software within the agreed timelines.

    • Document technical and functional specifications.

    • Evaluate and increase the program’s effectiveness by updating, repairing, modifying and developing existing generic applications.

    • Perform unit and integration testing during development.

  2. Software Testing, Implementation, and Support

    • Conduct functional and non-functional testing of the software developed in a controlled staging environment prior to launch.

    • Assist user in User Acceptance Test (UAT) to ensure the program can be used easily.

    • Prepare test modules and user manuals.

    • Deploy the finished software to production.

    • Conduct training to the application end users if requested

    • Provide 2nd level troubleshooting and debug to existing software, reacting to issues and correcting the source code as deemed necessary.

    • Provide on-site support for events and promotions if requested.

    • Evaluate existing applications to reprogram, update and add new features as deemed necessary.

    • Actively monitor the performance of existing applications/solutions and present ideas for improvements.

    • Make sure that changes in applications already deployed in production have undergone approval and are properly documented.

 

QUALIFICATIONS

  • Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science/Computer Engineering/ Information Systems/ Information Technology or other similar course

  • At least one (1) year of experience in Software Development

  • Background in Application Development is preferred

  • Familiarity with Atlassian Software Development Tools and Agile-Scrum development methodologies

  • Knowledgeable in SQL, MS SQL, MVC2-MVC4, JavaScript, HTML, VB.NET, ASP.NET, C#, XML and PHP

  • Experience with software design and development in a test-driven environment

title: Senior Backend Developer (Python/Java) Work From Home
job_desc:
Join our award-winning IT team as we lead the way in digital, cloud, and security technology services. You will be playing a critical role in delivering innovative solutions for our biggest client, Canada’s leading telecommunications, tech, and media corporation.

 

We’re looking for passionate and creative tech leaders who want to take their career to the next level and make a real impact. Our success is fueled by our people and our passion for innovation, so we empower our Qmunity and provide a workplace where they can flourish and grow.

 

We offer premium benefits, including:

  • Work From Home Set up
  • Salary based on experience, miscellaneous allowances
  • Performance bonuses and yearly increase
  • HMO from day 1 for you + 2 free dependents
  • 6 months paid maternity/15 days paternity leave
  • Company-sponsored training and upskilling, and career growth opportunities!

 

 You will have the opportunity to…  

  • You will develop design, debug, and operate multiple applications used by Bell network operation/engineering teams and support legacy applications running on-premises.
  • You will provide engineering support on end-to-end problem resolution and root cause analysis in collaboration with other functional groups, business units, and vendors
  • You will represent messaging services with corporate security teams & rest of the company
  • You can quickly learn and adapt to new technologies, and you have a strong aptitude for innovation

                                    

Minimum Required Skills & Experience:

  • 5+ years of experience in Software Development
  • 5+ years of experience in object-oriented software and application development mainly in Python and Java.
  • 5+ years of experience in experience in Agile Development, DevOps, and Test-Driven Design
  • 5+ years of experience in unit testing, Test-Driven Development, code review, continuous integration, continuous delivery & DevOps practices.

 

Nice to have:

  • Someone who is very familiar with code management tools (GIT) and possibly automation/orchestration tools such as Ansible/Puppet but considers Infra-As-Code as a new religion
  • Someone who can slice and dice a business/system problem into an easy modular and maintainable solution with your team
  • A team player who can define, establish, and communicate their long-term vision, who is adaptable to uncertain and changing needs
  • A candidate with strong interpersonal, oral, and written communication skills (A good sense of humor is a bonus!)
  • Superior coaching skills with the ability to raise your team’s game through your teaching
  • Experience with container environment (Docker, Kubernetes, or even DockerSwarm), because new stuff is fun!
  • Experience with real-time stream processing (Kafka).
  • Experience in a Public Cloud. GCP, AWS, Azure, or any will do.
  • Linux and/or Agile certification
  • Strong IP networking skills     

 

If you’re ready to take the next step in your career, APPLY NOW!

title: Software Engineer
job_desc:
OPENTEXT

OpenText is a global leader in information management, where innovation, creativity, and collaboration are the key components of our corporate culture. As a member of our team, you will have the opportunity to partner with the most highly regarded companies in the world, tackle complex issues, and contribute to projects that shape the future of digital transformation.

YOUR IMPACT

OpenText is more than just a place of employment. It’s an exciting and diverse organization with intelligent people, innovative programs, and dynamic opportunities to enhance your career and life. The OpenText culture recognizes “People First” and supports you to further develop and grow your career.

The Cloud Applications Consultant (internal job title) / Software Engineer (external job title) is an individual contributor who acts as a primary point of contact for implementing customers’ requests regarding mapping and addition of new trading partners, document types, and connection types. As a consultant, you will utilize your ability to combine mapping analysis, development, systems integration and service delivery knowledge. More specifically you will create/update technical specifications and create/update maps using OpenText translation software, carry out integration tasks to deploy maps to pre-production and production environments and setup Trading Partner connectivity using common communications standards such as ftp, http, AS2, SFTP, etc.

WHAT THE ROLE OFFERS

  • Engages the client to obtain EDI (Electronic Data Interchange) requirements, ensuring the completeness and accuracy of map packages and requirements documentation while developing and maintaining good customer relations.

  • Analyzing customer requirements, data integrations and interfaces.

  • Deliver day to day implementation requests of Trading Partner and map configurations into the OpenText systems.

  • Implementing changes for existing data integrations.

  • Follow policies and best practice mapping to define map rules based on client’s requirements.

  • Consistently create test cases/scenarios, form test files, run tests and evaluate reports

  • Investigate and conduct root-cause-analysis for issues/defects raised by client during client testing

  • Deliver project status updates to clients, delivery/project managers and counterparts as necessary

WHAT YOU NEED TO SUCCEED

  • You are a graduate of Computer Science and/or other technical disciplines

  • You are willing to be on-call beyond normal working hours and on weekends

  • You are willing to work on any shifts (ASPAC, EMEA or US).

  • You are willing to do a hybrid work set up (2 days WFH, 3 days onsite in Makati)

  • Knowledgeable in XSLT, Java, JavaScript, PDF or XML is a plus.

  • You have a strong customer focus, customer satisfaction oriented.

  • You demonstrate problem-solving skills, logical thinking techniques, and excellent attention to detail. Ability to Identify and analyze problems; distinguishes between relevant and irrelevant information to make logical decisions; provide solutions to individual and organizational problems. Develops reasonable options for solutions when required for decision making

  • You have excellent teamwork and collaboration skills. Inspires and motivates others toward goal accomplishments; develops and sustains cooperative working relationships

  • You have ability to handle multiple priorities in a fast-paced environment, and be able to work independently, and must possess effective time management skills

ONE LAST THING:

OpenText is more than just a corporation, it's a global community where trust is foundational, the bar is raised, and outcomes are owned. We take pride in the high expectations placed on us by our customers and strive to exceed those expectations with a culture that fosters extraordinary customer service. We are the voice of our customers, and we focus on making them wildly successful.

title: Infrastructure Automation Developer (PowerShell or Python)
job_desc:
About our company

First Focus is Australia's best Managed Service Provider (MSP), with a team of over 280 technical professionals across offices in Australia, New Zealand and the Philippines. We have grown consistently and profitably for over 15 years, and we're continuing to win new clients and challenge ourselves to rise to new heights.

We have just started the search for the best experienced Automation and Integration professional to join our Technology team in the Philippines. Why would such an amazing and talented individual consider coming to First Focus? What makes First Focus better than where you are today?

  • We actively promote equal opportunity and fair treatment for all our employees, irrespective of their position, location or nationality, fostering a positive and inclusive workplace culture - grow your career!
  • We understand the value you deliver, and we will give you the support to get the job done - be supported to be awesome!
  • We find and retain the best - best Product Owners, best PMs, best Service desk team, best managers, best team!
  • We encourage transparency as one of the foundations of our culture, creating a healthier, more productive work environment while actively discouraging toxicity - be heard, feel safe to speak up!

Our goal is to automate internal functions and we need talented people who can draw on experience from within our internal software development team and utilise Advanced Scripting and Development skills to make our business fly.

 

Employee Perks

  • Dayshift, weekends off
  • Above the market salary range
  • 25 days paid leave annually*
  • 10 paid days of training leave per year*
  • Employee Profit Sharing*
  • Loyalty bonus for long-term employees*
  • HMO from the first day of your employment, which includes Medical coverage plus dental benefits package
  • Addition of one (1) more dependent (e.g., your spouse) to the Company's HMO policy from day 1
  • As a loyalty incentive, you may add one additional dependent after 2 years of service and a third dependent after 5 years.
  • Company-paid Training and Certifications with corresponding salary increase (T&C apply)
  • Hybrid work set-up*
  • Employee Referral Program (Php 20,000)
  • Employee MVP Award (Php 10,000)

 

What you would be doing:

You will be involved in some, if not all, of the following tasks:

  • Automation scripting using one or more of the following technologies - Bash, Python, PHP and Powershell
  • Configuration and maintenance of API orchestration and orchestration platforms
  • Building complex automations that interact directly with MS-SQL, MySQL, NoSQL and APIs
  • Creating and configuring AI solutions

 

Requirements

What skills you do need to have:

To be successful, we are looking for someone with many of the following skills and experience:

  • Driven to perform/outcome driven
  • Someone who wants to be seen to perform/punch above their weight
  • Strong automation scripting experience with one or more of the following - Bash, Python, Powershell, PHP etc
  • Strong database experience in SQL (MS-SQL, MySQL, NoSQL)
  • Experience automating/integrating multiple systems and tools
  • Strong analytical and problem-solving skills
  • Willing to work on AU shift

 

You will have a real advantage winning this role if you have any of the following:

  • Demonstrated experience working with various open source frameworks
  • Demonstrated experience using ConnectWise Manage databases or ITSM/PSA system
  • In-depth knowledge of PowerShell
  • Previous work experience in an MSP
  • CI/CD experience
  • RPA experience
  • Knowledge of SharePoint

 

Office Address: 

  • 29th Floor, Robinsons Cyberscape Gamma, Topaz Road, Ortigas Pasig City Metro Manila Philippines
  • 26th floor, Axis Tower One Building, Filinvest Ave, Alabang, Muntinlupa

 

Additional Information

  • Opportunity to work from home. If you are residing within Metro Manila or in other nearby provinces, a hybrid work set-up will apply.

*Terms and condition apply

title: Software Developer
job_desc:
About Toolkit Inc.:

At Toolkit Inc., we specialize in transforming business processes through innovative software solutions. Our expertise ranges from ERP implementation with custom Odoo integration to developing full-stack, enterprise-grade applications using the latest technologies. We are at the forefront of incorporating Machine Learning and AI into business analytics, delivering insightful data interpretations. Our team excels in crafting user-centric mobile applications and creative UX designs across various platforms, ensuring an engaging and efficient user experience. Committed to advancing businesses into the digital era, we also offer comprehensive cloud services for seamless, scalable operations. At Toolkit Inc., we are dedicated to making businesses more efficient and effective, one innovative app at a time.

Job Summary:

We are seeking talented and motivated Full-Stack Software Developers to join our team. The successful candidate will work closely with other developers, designers, and project managers to develop and maintain high-quality software applications using a variety of programming languages.

Key Responsibilities:

  • Design, develop, test, and deploy high-quality software applications using Python, JavaScript, and other programming languages.
  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams to integrate new features and optimize application performance.
  • Write clean, efficient, and maintainable code that adheres to industry standards and best practices.
  • Debug and troubleshoot software issues, and provide solutions to improve application performance and reliability.
  • Develop and maintain documentation, including technical specifications and user manuals, for all software applications.
  • Participate in code review, unit testing, and integration testing to ensure code quality and application functionality.
  • Stay up-to-date with emerging trends and technologies in software development, and apply them to develop innovative and efficient solutions.

Requirements:

  • Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field. Undergraduates with advanced software development skills are also welcome to apply.
  • Strong programming skills in Python, JavaScript, and familiarity with other languages such as Java, C#, Ruby, or PHP.
  • Experience with PostgreSQL and software development tools and technologies such as Git, SQL databases, RESTful APIs, and cloud platforms such as AWS, Google Cloud, or Azure.
  • Experience with agile software development methodologies and tools such as Jira, Trello, or Asana.
  • Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
  • Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to work effectively in a team environment.

Preferred Qualifications:

  • Experience in developing and deploying machine learning models using Python libraries such as Pandas, Flask, Django, Tensorflow, Odoo.
  • Familiarity with front-end development technologies such as HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
  • Understanding of software security principles and best practices.

Why Join Toolkit Inc.?

  • Be part of a creative, forward-thinking team.
  • Opportunity to work on diverse projects and learn new technologies.
  • Competitive salary and benefits package.
  • Flexible working hours and remote working options.
  • A culture that values innovation, efficiency, and continuous learning.

title: Senior Software Engineer (Python Back-end Development)
job_desc:
Recognised as a Great Place to Work, ITRS is an Enterprise SaaS provider with industry-leading solutions. Our prestigious customer base includes 90% of the world's top investment banks. We are backed by leading private equity investors and are rapidly growing.

Our headquarters are in Shoreditch - London's tech hub – with offices in other UK and global locations from the Netherlands to Manila, NYC and Florida. We pride ourselves on a diverse, friendly, dynamic culture - with a focus on internal promotion and developing our people.

 

Scope of role

As a Senior Software Engineer you will deliver new features in our Opsview product suite, you will report to the Engineering Manager in our Makati office. The Engineering team is a global team with main hubs in Manila, Sweden, Spain, UK and North America.

The Makati office is growing and we are looking for Engineers that want to be part of a successful team building software products and working with the latest technologies.  

 

As a Senior Software Engineer, you will:

  • Build software for our Opsview product suite  
  • Take a lead on user story definition and the production of detailed technical designs  
  • Develop software and unit tests against those detailed designs  
  • Take a lead on the production of engineering estimates and timescales
  • Maintain current technical documentation at the code, design and user levels  
  • Maintain the software on an ongoing basis
  • Review others work at design and code stage and provide constructive feedback on how it could be improved  
  • Partner with our dedicated product support team to help fix customer raised defects 



Requirements

  • 5 years of experience with Python Application Development
  • Experience working with RDBMS and NoSQL databases (MySQL and CouchDB)  
  • Experience with Unix/Linux at the command line 
  • Experience in version control systems like Git 
  • Experienced in overseeing product architecture
  • Experience working in continuous integration environments (Jenkins/Groovy) 
  • Experience in code profiling and writing unit tests  
  • Experience improving coding and development practices  
  • Experience quickly assimilating new technologies and skills  
  • Experience working within an Agile scrum team  
  • Willing to work in a hybrid setup, reporting onsite at least once a week to our Makati office



Benefits

  • HMO for you and your dependents
  • Supplemental Medical Claim

title: Software Engineer – AI/Machine Learning Developer (work-from-home)
job_desc:
Job Qualifications: 

  • Minimum four (4) years of related experience as an AI/Machine Learning Developer. 
  • Ability to work on multiple projects/ tasks in an agile environment. 
  • Good communication and presentation skills at all levels – colleagues, clients and top management. 
  • Results-oriented, resourceful and a good team-player.

 Experience/Skills Requirement:

  • DSPY: Strong understanding of AI concepts and techniques using DSPY.
  • Python: Proficiency in Python programming, including libraries such as Pandas for data manipulation, NumPy for numerical computations, and scikit-learn for machine learning.
  • RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation): Experience with RAG techniques to enhance model performance and output relevance.
  • Vector Databases: Knowledge of vector databases like Faiss or Milvus.
  • NET: Experience with .NET for integrating machine learning models into applications.
  • Prompt Engineering for LLMs: Experience in designing and refining prompts for Large Language Models (LLMs) such as ChatGPT to optimize their performance and interaction.
  • API Development: Experience in developing and consuming APIs.
  • Deployment: Proven experience in deploying Python projects to production environments.
  • Model Training: Proven experience in creating, training, and optimizing custom machine learning models.

 Responsibilities and Duties: 

  • Is expected to conduct research, design, implement and manage software applications based on user requirements
  • To respond to and manage change quickly, including the refocusing of development efforts and adapting to evolving requirements
  • To continue to update his/her technical knowledge and skills
  • Evaluating machine learning processes
  • Collecting and analyzing large amounts of data
  • Programming AI software to utilize large amounts of data
  • Developing and deploying AI algorithms
  • Collaborating with other team members to establish goals for AI processes
  • Evaluating the effectiveness of AI
  • Managing data and project infrastructure
  • Staying up to date on the latest AI developments

Most importantly, we are looking for people who can live by our Values:

  • Providing superior customer experiences
  • Creating an awesome work environment
  • Pursuing opportunities for diversification and growth
  • Communicating openly and honestly
  • Giving back to the communities in which we live and work

title: Junior Application Developer
job_desc:
About the role

NexFin Solutions Inc. is seeking a talented Junior Application Developer to join our dynamic team in Muntinlupa City, Metro Manila. As a Junior Application Developer, you will play a crucial role in the development and enhancement of our cutting-edge financial technology applications in Odoo and SAP.   This role offers an excellent opportunity to gain hands-on experience in a fast-paced and challenging environment, contributing to the digital transformation of our clients' businesses. 

What you'll be doing

  • Assist in the design, development, and deployment of new software features and applications
  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams to understand and translate business requirements into technical solutions
  • Write clean, maintainable, and efficient code using python or SAP programming languages and frameworks
  • Participate in code reviews, testing, and debugging to ensure the quality and reliability of our products
  • Stay up-to-date with industry trends, technologies, and best practices to continuously improve our applications
  • Contribute to the documentation and knowledge-sharing within the development team
  • Gain an understanding of business operations and how our system, Odoo and SAP, can support them.
  • Participate in agile development processes.

Qualifications:

  • Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field (or equivalent practical experience).   
  • Minimum of 1 year of professional experience in Python development.
  • Willing to learn SAP ABAP programming.
  • Familiarity with object-oriented programming principles.
  • Basic understanding of web technologies (HTML, CSS, JavaScript).
  • Familiarity with relational databases (e.g., PostgreSQL).
  • Basic understanding of Linux or other operating systems.
  • Strong problem-solving and analytical skills.
  • Excellent communication and teamwork skills.
  • Ability to learn quickly and adapt to new technologies.
  • Familiarity with business operations and workflows is a plus.
  • Prior experience with Odoo is a plus, but not required.
  • Experience with Git or other version control systems.

What we offer

At NexFin Solutions Inc., we are committed to providing our employees with a rewarding and fulfilling work experience. We offer competitive compensation, comprehensive health and wellness benefits, and ample opportunities for professional development and career advancement. Our company culture values innovation, teamwork, and a work-life balance, ensuring that our employees can thrive both professionally and personally.

About us
NexFin Solutions Inc. is a leading provider of innovative financial technology solutions. Our mission is to revolutionize the way individuals and businesses manage their finances, by developing cutting-edge applications that are user-friendly, secure, and highly efficient. With a dynamic and talented team, we are continuously striving to push the boundaries of what's possible in the IT industry.

If you are excited about the prospect of joining our team and contributing to the development of our innovative products, we encourage you to apply now.

Location: Muntinlupa City (Hybrid -Onsite/Offsite Arrangement)

title: Backend Developer
job_desc:
This position is a night shift position with a schedule of 9am EST - 6pm EST. Candidates must have experience with and have the ability to work a night shift schedule.

We are seeking a Backend Developer specializing in Python (Django) and Azure Cloud to develop and maintain scalable backend systems and APIs for modern web applications. The ideal candidate has strong experience with databases, cloud deployments, API development, and thrives in an agile development team.

What You’ll Be Doing
• Develop and maintain scalable backend services and RESTful APIs using Django and Django REST Framework.
• Design and implement secure, efficient, and scalable database structures using PostgreSQL.
• Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design, and ship new features.
• Deploy and manage applications in Azure Cloud, including CI/CD pipeline management.
• Write and maintain unit, integration, and end-to-end tests to ensure application stability.
• Optimize web applications for maximum speed and scalability.
• Troubleshoot, debug, and resolve software issues across the full stack.
 

What You Bring
• Experience with Python, with a strong focus on Django (Django REST Framework preferred).
• Proficiency in building scalable APIs, microservices, and backend logic.
• Experience with ORMs (Django ORM, SQLAlchemy), relational databases (PostgreSQL, MySQL), and ephemeral storage (Redis).
• Knowledge of asynchronous processing (Celery, Redis) and background task management.
• Experience with event-driven architectures (Kafka, RabbitMQ, or Azure Event Hub).
• Familiarity with GraphQL for API development.
• Prior experience working with authentication & authorization frameworks (OAuth, JWT, Azure AD B2C).
• Knowledge of monitoring and logging (Azure Monitor, Application Insights).
• Excellent written and verbal communication skills, with the ability to explain technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders.
• Strong collaboration skills, working effectively with designers, product managers, and other engineers.
• Ability to document code, system architecture, and processes for knowledge sharing.
• Experience working in Agile development teams.
• Willingness to mentor junior developers and share best practices.
• Open to receiving and providing constructive feedback in a team environment.
• A growth mindset, continuously seeking to learn new technologies and improve skills.
• Ability to prioritize tasks effectively in a fast-paced development environment.
• Strong problem-solving skills with the ability to troubleshoot complex issues independently.
• Comfortable handling multiple projects and deadlines while maintaining quality.

title: Python Backend/Fullstack Engineer | Permanent WFH | Night Shift | Day 1 HMO
job_desc:
Code the Future, Engineer Your Success!

Be at the forefront of innovation in the healthcare industry, where every line of code contributes to better patient care and groundbreaking advancements. This global role lets you make a meaningful impact while staying rooted at home. Drive change, tackle exciting challenges, and take your career to the next level in healthcare technology.

Job Description

As a Python Backend/Fullstack Engineer, you will design, develop, and maintain innovative web applications using Python. You'll collaborate with diverse teams to deliver scalable, high-performance solutions, optimize code, and contribute to the planning and successful execution of impactful software projects.

Job Overview

Employment Type: Full-Time
Shift: Night Shift; Mon - Fri, 09:00 PM to 06:00 AM, Weekends Off
Work Setup: Permanent Work From Home

Exciting Perks Await!

  • Day 1 HMO coverage with free dependent
  • Competitive Salary Package
  • Permanent WFH arrangement
  • Fixed weekends off
  • Unlimited upskilling through Emapta Academy courses (Want to know more? Visit https://bit.ly/EmaptaTrainingCalendar)
  • Free 24/7 access to our office gyms (Ortigas and Makati) with a free physical fitness trainer!
  • Exclusive Emapta Lifestyle perks (hotel and restaurant discounts, and more!)
  • Unlimited opportunities for employee referral incentives across the organization
  • Standard government and Emapta benefits
  • Total of 20 annual leaves to be used on your own discretion (including 5 credits convertible to cash)
  • Fun engagement activities for employees
  • Mentorship and exposure to global leaders and teams
  • Career growth opportunities
  • Diverse and supportive work environment

The Qualifications We Seek

  • Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field.
  • 4+ years of hands-on Python development experience in web or software applications (strictly required).
  • Proficiency in backend development with strong knowledge of web application architecture and RESTful API design.
  • Experience with database management, including MySQL, PostgreSQL, or MongoDB.
  • Familiarity with version control systems, particularly Git.
  • Optional: Experience with front-end technologies, especially React (nice-to-have).
  • Strong problem-solving and analytical skills, with the ability to troubleshoot complex issues.
  • Ability to work independently and collaborate effectively in a team environment.
  • Excellent communication skills, with the ability to convey technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders.
  • Willing to work night shifts as required.

Your Daily Tasks

  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams to gather and analyze project requirements.
  • Design, develop, and maintain robust and scalable web applications using Python and React.
  • Write clean, maintainable, and efficient code while adhering to best practices and coding standards.
  • Implement responsive and user-friendly interfaces to enhance the overall user experience.
  • Integrate user-facing elements with server-side logic in collaboration with backend developers.
  • Troubleshoot, debug, and optimize code to improve performance and reliability.
  • Stay updated on industry trends and advancements to continuously refine development processes.
  • Conduct code reviews and provide constructive feedback to enhance team performance.
  • Collaborate with product managers and stakeholders to ensure the successful delivery of features and projects.
  • Plan and execute software development projects, ensuring adherence to timelines and milestones.

About the Client: Driving Innovation in the Healthcare Industry

Our client is a leader in the healthcare industry, committed to advancing solutions that transform patient care and outcomes. With a focus on innovation and collaboration, they deliver cutting-edge technology to improve healthcare processes. Be part of a team that values your expertise while working on projects that make a difference globally.

Welcome to Emapta Philippines!

Join a team that values camaraderie, excellence, and growth. Recognized as one of the Top 20 Dream Companies of Filipinos in 2024, Emapta stands proudly alongside industry giants, offering stability and exciting career opportunities. Your career flourishes here with competitive compensation, international clients, and a work culture focused on collaboration and innovation. Work with global clients across industries, supported by a stable foundation and like-minded professionals passionate about making an impact. We empower your success with opportunities for personal and professional development in an inclusive environment. Apply now and discover the #EmaptaExperience!

title: IT.Junior Developer
company: CITCO INTERNATIONAL SUPPORT SERVICES LIMITED-PHILIPPINE ROHQ
job_desc:
About Citco

Since the 1940s Citco has provided specialist financial services to alternative investment funds, investors, multinationals and private clients worldwide. With over 6,000 employees in 45 countries, we pioneer innovative solutions that meet our clients’ evolving needs and deliver exceptional service. 

Our continuous investment in learning means our people are among the best in the industry. And our corporate social responsibility programs provide meaningful and fulfilling work in the community.

A career at Citco isn’t just a job – it’s an opportunity to excel in an environment that genuinely supports your personal and professional development.

 

About the Role: 

You will be part of a new cross-functional team, using agile methodologies to build cloud native applications for the financial services industry.  We are looking for true team players who can work beyond their specialty to help the team deliver.   Each Team member is responsible for the quality of the product and should be willing to work on any tasks needed, be it front-end, back end, test automation, deployment automation, etc. The successful candidate will use their experience and knowledge to deliver the components of large systems and guide the evolution of our applications.

 

Job Duties in Brief: 

  • Participate in agile team activities such as Sprint Planning, Sprint Execution, Daily Scrum, Sprint Review, Sprint Retrospective etc.

  • Develop front end React components

  • Develop and test server-side code using Python

  • Be comfortable using relational databases

  • Create and consume APIs 

    • Participate in peer reviews and ensure the quality of the team’s work 

    • Design and implement unit, integration, and automation tests

    • Work on code integration and code deployment of existing modules as well as provide new pipelines for new modules (CI/CD)

    • Stay current on emerging technologies and be able to match them to Citco need when required       

About You: 

  • Bachelor’s degree in Engineering, Computer Science, or equivalent

  • 1-3 years of experience with Software engineering 

  • 1-3 years of experience with Python 

  • 1-3 years of experience with React JS

  • Excellent knowledge of HTML5, ES6, CSS3, JavaScript and JavaScript frameworks

  • Experience with source code management such as GIT

  • Exposure in designing and integrating RESTful APIs

  • Experience of working in Agile teams

  • Exposure of Kubernetes, Docker, and/or cloud deployment technologies (preferable)

  • Exposure to AWS is an asset

  • Solid understanding and demonstrated proficiency with core software development processes - debugging, code tuning, code management and branching, coding styles and refactoring 

  • Experience in unit/integration testing

  • Must be self-motivated and driven, with strong analytical, problem solving, and communication skills.

 

What We Offer: 

  • A challenging and rewarding role in an award-winning global business.

  • Opportunities for personal and professional career development. 

  • Great working environment, competitive salary and benefits, and opportunities for educational support.

  • Be part of an industry leading global team, renowned for excellence.

  • Hybrid working set-up.

 

Our Benefits

Your well-being is of paramount importance to us, and central to our success. We provide a range of benefits, training and education support, and flexible working arrangements to help you achieve success in your career while balancing personal needs. Ask us about specific benefits in your location. 

We embrace diversity, prioritizing the hiring of people from diverse backgrounds. Our inclusive culture is a source of pride and strength, fostering innovation and mutual respect.

Citco welcomes and encourages applications from people with disabilities. Accommodations are available upon request for candidates taking part in all aspects of the selection.

title: Mid-level Back-end Developer
job_desc:
We’re looking for a Mid-level Backend Developer with 3+ years of experience in Node.js, NestJS, SQL/NoSQL databases, AWS, and performance optimization to build scalable backend systems.

What You'll Do:

- Develop and maintain backend services using Node.js & NestJS.

- Design secure, efficient REST APIs and scalable architectures.

- Work with SQL & NoSQL databases (PostgreSQL, MySQL, MongoDB, DynamoDB).

- Implement caching (Redis, Memcached) and queueing (RabbitMQ, Kafka, SQS).

- Deploy and manage apps on AWS (Lambda, EC2, S3, RDS, DynamoDB).

- Collaborate with the team to solve complex technical challenges.

What We’re Looking For:

- 3+ years of backend development with Node.js & NestJS.

- Strong database expertise in SQL & NoSQL.

- Experience with microservices, caching, queueing, event-driven architectures.

- Hands-on AWS experience (Lambda, SQS, RDS, S3, etc.).

- Ability to design scalable, high-performance systems.

- Experience leading projects or making key technical decisions.

Nice to Have:

Experience with time-series or distributed databases.

Knowledge of GraphQL, gRPC, DevOps, or event-driven systems.

Full-time, on-site role in Cebu (near Ayala Center), daytime shift.

If this sounds like you, send your resume to careers.ph@n-compass.biz!

title: Junior Software Engineer
job_desc:
Who we are

CHAMP Cargosystems is building systems that power the business of cargo airlines all over the world providing solutions for the whole cargo management chain including reservation and booking management, revenue, handling & customs declaration and balancing the weight of the cargo inside the plane.

What we do

We are currently in the process of building the next generation of cargo management applications using modern and widely use technologies and we are looking for motivated people to join our team of interdisciplinary developers.

What we currently use

  • We build backend services with Java, Spring Boot, Web Services and Oracle / SQL Server / Mongo DB
  • We integrate with existing core Java Cargo applications via REST APIs
  • We build frontends with Angular and Ionic framework for mobile apps
  • We deploy to Linux servers, Windows servers, and AWS with ansible/ANT
  • We do continuous integration with Gitlab/Bamboo
  • We use Scrum to organize ourselves

What we expect from you

  • Perform several roles such as program coder, tester and technical support 
  • Collaborate with other software engineers in the performance of assigned tasks.
  • Translate design specifications into program codes; enforce the Company’s software engineering methodology and standards.
  • Champion good code quality practices towards reliable, performant and maintainable solutions
  • Participate in the technical discussions on project updates/ in resolving technical issues.
  • Produce clean, efficient code based on specifications.
  • Troubleshoot, debug and upgrade existing software.
  • Participate in the unit tests and to provide support during system implementation/ migration activities.
  • Assist in the preparation of project documentation.

What we require from you

  • Bachelor’s Degree in Information Technology, Computer Science, Computer Engineering or Equivalent
  • Must have 2 years’ experience in Java & object-oriented programming with SQL skills 
  • Understanding in the following framework or technology is a plus: Spring Boot, REST API, XML, HTML, Angular 
  • Experienced in using the following tools – SVN, Tortoise, Eclipse, Maven or Ant or similar
  • With good SQL skills on databases (Oracle, SQL Server)
  • Experience in SCRUM and DevOps practices is a plus
  • Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills
  • Strong interpersonal skills
  • Good command of English language is a must

What you can expect from us

  • Working environment, learning tools and opportunities to grow your technical and professional career  
  • The possibility to have an impact on the direction to take
  • Technical challenges to solve
  • The opportunity to work within an interesting industry
  • To work with people from many different countries

 

 

 

CHAMP Cargosystems is an equal opportunity employer and prohibits discrimination and harassment of any kind. We are committed to the principle of equal employment opportunity for all employees and to providing employees with a work environment free of discrimination and harassment. All employment decisions are based on business needs, job requirements and individual qualifications, without regard to race, ethnic background, religion or belief, family or parental status, or any other status protected by the laws or regulations in the locations where we operate.

Please note that any personal data that you submit along with your application will be processed by CHAMP and may be processed by any of its global entities as necessary. These data will be treated in strict compliance with the applicable data protection legislation (i.e. the Law of 2 August 2002 on the protection of individuals with regard to the processing of personal data, as amended, and Regulation (EU) 2016/679 of the European Parliament and of the Council of 27 April 2016, - the GDPR -, which entered into force on 25 May 2018, as well as any other subsequent regulation).

Further details on what is considered personal data, how it is processed by CHAMP as well as your rights in this regard can be found here. Any questions relating to this should be addressed to CHAMP’s Data Protection Officer:

Gertrud Huberty
2, rue Edmond Reuter

Luxembourg

title: Full Stack Application Developer
job_desc:
With 75 years of experience, our focus is on helping the most vulnerable children overcome poverty and experience fullness of life. We help children of all backgrounds, even in the most dangerous places, inspired by our Christian faith.

Come join our 33,000+ staff working in nearly 100 countries and share the joy of transforming vulnerable children’s life stories!

Key Responsibilities:

  • Full-time permanent position

  • Fully remote

  • Day shift

As a FULL STACK DEVELOPER, you will work on multiple projects that may span a broad range of applications as a project team member, sometimes as a project lead.  You may require expertise in multiple technical environments and business knowledge that spans one or more business areas. 

As a Full Stack Developer, you must be able to adjust to constant business change and as needed to proactively plan for changes that are likely to occur. Common types of changes include introduction of new organizations through mergers and acquisitions, the separation of parts of organization (as subsidiaries, or when the business changes direction), evolving goals and strategies and emerging technologies. These changes require integration of solutions that can impact the overall system development activity. Application Developers also provide client support, consultation and subject matter expertise for system development, maintenance and support. 

In this job family you will work closely with clients, business analysts and team members to understand the business requirements that drive the analysis and design of quality technical solutions. These solutions must be aligned with business and IT strategies and are in compliance with the organization’s architectural standards. Application Developers are involved in the full systems life cycle and therefore are responsible for designing, coding, testing, implementing and supporting application software that is delivered on time and within budget. Responsibilities beyond development of software may include participation in component and data architecture design, technology planning, product evaluation, advanced testing processes and buy vs. build recommendations. Individuals also provide input to project plans related to the Application Development initiative.  

As a Full Stack Application Developer, you need to have a strong knowledge of programming languages used by the organization. You need experience in systems design and have a solid understanding of development, database development, testing, and integration methodologies.  Knowledge of current and emerging IT products, services and processes is required. 


MAJOR RESPONSIBILITIES:

PROJECT PLANNING: 
Participates in all project planning processes. 
May develop work plan timelines and manage work flows to meet project timeframes. 

APPLICATION PORTFOLIO MGT: 
Works with Applications Team Lead and ‘operations team’ and architects to ensure the practical, smooth, effective application retirement which may include any data migration, planning of application de-coupling, and staging and phasing of work to ensure smooth, risk-free application retirement. 

DATA REQUIREMENTS: 
Identifies better sources of data feeds and interfaces with architects to ensure their feasibility with corporate data warehouse, when needed. 
Actively participates in planning sessions with Architecture team to define, plan, analyze, implement and operationalize enterprise data model.

DESIGN: 
Identifies technical requirements.  
Creates technical design specifications and assists and reviews technical design specifications developed by junior levels

CODE AND TEST:  
Codes applications or enterprise-wide software systems using a disciplined development process and in accord with the company’s standard development process (SDLC).  
Integrates solutions with other applications and platforms outside the framework.  
Creates data extracts and reports from system based requirements.   
Develops, executes and documents test plans.

DEPLOYMENT: 
May lead in the deployment of new modules, upgrades and fixes to the production environment.  
Makes modules production-ready by moving them to libraries, completing forms, following procedures, completing version control documents, etc. 
Ensures modules are production-ready. 

MAINTENANCE (BREAK/FIX): 
Provides ongoing maintenance of applications. 
Leads review sessions where patterns of development and break/fix metrics are reviewed as part of standard process for optimizing IT development processes. 

PRODUCTION SUPPORT: 
Provides Level 2 and 3 production support. 
Troubleshoots existing information systems to identify errors or deficiencies and develops solutions

PERFORMANCE MANAGEMENT: 
Evaluates existing applications and platform and provides recommendations for improving application performance by conducting gap analysis, identifying feasible alternative solutions, and assisting in the scope of modifications.  
Participates on teams that outline the process and scope out the improvements that can be realized through the application solution. 

DOCUMENTATION/USER GUIDES: 
Documents functions and changes to new or modified modules and test activities/results and other areas such as error handling and backup/recovery procedures.  
Assists in the development of user guides and training documentation for systems

STANDARDS, POLICIES, AND PROCEDURES: 
Adheres to standards and procedures. 
Reviews modules for quality assurance and checks compliance with applications standards and Service Level Agreements (SLAs).  
Helps to define the company’s standard development process (SDLC).  
Periodically works with Application Developer Team Lead to review and revise company’s standard development process (SDLC) in alignment with changes in corporate and business goals, and as required by IT architectural standards

TECHNOLOGY EVALUATION AND RESEARCH: 
Evaluates new application packages and tools and performs research on best practices.   
Provides recommendations for solutions

TRAINING: 
May prepare and present formal training to IT staff, as needed

COACHING/MENTORING: 
Provides technical coaching and mentoring to less-experienced team members. 
Provides technical guidance or system process expertise. 
Develops reports and presentations for senior management, as needed

QUALIFICATIONS:

1. Work Experience:
   - 5-10 years of experience in application development, covering both Front-End and Back-End
   - 5-7 years of experience in application programming and analysis.

2. Education: Bachelor's degree in Programming/Systems, Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field. 

3. Technical Skills:
   - Proficient in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
   - Experience with front-end frameworks like React, Angular, or similar.
   - Knowledge of back-end frameworks and libraries such as Python or Node.js.
   - Familiarity with SQL Server or other databases.
   - Understanding of RESTful APIs.
   - Experience with Azure DevOps is a plus.
  - Preferred but not required: Knowledge of languages such as C++, C#, Java

4. Application Development
   - Proven experience in designing, developing, and testing applications using established or emerging technologies.
   - Broad understanding of information systems and application architecture standards.
   - Ability to analyze and interpret complex problems or processes that span multiple business areas.
   - Capability to identify and understand requirements and develop alternative solutions.

5. Additional:
   - Willingness and ability to travel domestically and internationally as necessary.
